name: Optimize Offsets QWK
description: Compute offsets for a regression predictor to miminize QWK

inputs.name: dataset
inputs.description: Prediction dataset from which to derive offsets

inputs.name: objective-field
inputs.description: Objective name or id, or blank to use the dataset's default

inputs.name: prediction-field
inputs.description: Prediction name or id, or blank to use

inputs.name: total-sub-bins
inputs.description: Number of sub-bins per bin of the offset table

inputs.name: delete-ds
inputs.description: If true, clean up datasets created during analysis
